name: clumsy-math
description: a math library for the clumsy and curious

scripts.buildDevelopmentPackage: yarn buildPackageSource && mkdir ./clumsy-math && cp -r ./package* ./clumsy-math && rm -rf ./node_modules/clumsy-math && cp -r ./clumsy-math ./node_modules && rm -rf ./clumsy-math && rm -rf ./package_source
